title: Help I think i was hacked
body: last night I was playing a ranked match and I got my account logged into, this made me nervous thinking oh I must've gave it to my friend, later that game when I reconnect and I got logged out again. now I'm scared, luckily I have a low level account to play with people who start up and its friends with the account that got hacked, I start getting spammed about boosted and then I got unfriended. I went to sleep cause it was late then I woke up logged onto my account and all my friends were gone, I checked my clubs and they all had this spammed "IM BOOSTED FAST ELO BOOST :) ( THEYRE SCAMMERS )" I asked my friends and they said they had been spammed too, I don't recall if I had gave anyone my password but if any one else has this problem please talk

replies.body:
I can definitely understanding getting spooked by this, but rest easy.  As a first step, go through our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help secure and reinforce your account.  Recently, I had an account outside of league acting up to the point I thought it may have been compromised but really it was just that some settings were auto-adjusted, so I can see how phishing attempts like that could ruse you into suspicion! 

If you have any issues with this or find anything missing, our account team can help through a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  You'll be in good hands!
